    Method

    ExtendedCellScanner
    Mutation.cellScanner()
    For client users: You should only use the return value as a CellScanner, ExtendedCellScanner is marked as IA.Private which means there is no guarantee about its API stability.
    ExtendedCellScanner
    Result.cellScanner()
    For client users: You should only use the return value as a CellScanner, ExtendedCellScanner is marked as IA.Private which means there is no guarantee about its API stability.
